class.name: JavaClass
class.brief_description: Represents a class from the Java Native Interface.
class.description: Represents a class from the Java Native Interface. It is returned from [method JavaClassWrapper.wrap]. [b]Note:[/b] This class only works on Android. On any other platform, this class does nothing. [b]Note:[/b] This class is not to be confused with [JavaScriptObject].

method.name: get_java_method_list
method.description: Returns the object's Java methods and their signatures as an [Array] of dictionaries, in the same format as [method Object.get_method_list].

method.name: get_java_parent_class
method.description: Returns a [JavaClass] representing the Java parent class of this class.
